description: This file provides core physics utilities for a platformer game, including gravity constants, a ground collision stub, and rectangle overlap collision detection functions.

methods.name: isCollidingWithGround(x, y, w, h)
methods.description: Stub function to determine if an object is colliding with the ground based on y-position and height.

methods.name: rectsOverlap(ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh)
methods.description: Checks if two axis-aligned rectangles overlap based on their positions and sizes.

ctags.name: GROUND_Y
ctags.pattern: /^export const GROUND_Y = 180 - 40; \/\/ Must match main engine and player$/

ctags.name: rectsOverlap
ctags.pattern: /^export function rectsOverlap(ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh) {$/
ctags.signature: (ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh)
